metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28009 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Exim 4 before 4.94.2 allows Integer Overflow to Buffer Overflow becauseget_stdinput allows unbounded reads that are accompanied by unboundedincreases in a certain size variable. NOTE: exploitation may be impracticalbecause of the execution time needed to overflow (multiple days).

criterions.comment: exim4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
